bill_title: increase the maximum nonrefundable application fee which may be established by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission for bighorn sheep, mountain goat, and elk licenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the maximum nonrefundable application fee which may be established by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission for bighorn sheep, mountain goat, and elk licenses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 41-6-19.6 be amended to read as follows: 41-6-19.6. The Game, Fish and Parks Commission may establish a separate nonrefundable application fee not to exceed five fifteen dollars each for any resident making application for a bighorn sheep license , a mountain goat license , or an elk license. Successful applicants shall be selected by drawing. Proceeds from the application fees collected shall be used for big game research and management. The commission may promulgate rules, pursuant to chapter 1-26, for the purpose of establishing a season and guidelines therefor and to establish the fee provisions. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
